title: WHAT DO YOU DO??
body: what do you do in this situation? im playing 3v3 theres a bot jax and its only me and another player... the other team likes the fact my teammate is getting upset in /all chat and they dont end the game... intentionally not ending the game and we cant surrender leads us into 30 mins of never ending feed fest? what would you do? sit in base and get afk? keep feeding them? quit the game completely and enjoy your ban even tho you did nothing wrong?

replies.body: I would think those minions would eventually push through and end the game for you. If you did stay until the end you'd be able to report them for "holding you hostage" in that match, which is what I would have done myself.
oh wow a red finally responds but just to troll me aswell.... great  no wonder the community so toxic
WOULD BE AMAZING if you guys could get people to stop using 3rd party programs on your game or change the ff system so 1 bot doesnt hold 5 other people back instead of making stupid comments
